# Node modules
node_modules/

# Environment variables
.env

# Logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/

# Build output
dist/
build/

# MongoDB files (if used locally)
*.mongodb
*.mongo
*.bson

# Local database or cache files
*.sqlite
*.db
*.log

# Uploaded files (optional)
uploads/

# Media files (optional - can remove if you want to upload these)
*.mp4
*.mp3
*.zip
*.pdf
*.mov

# Mac & Linux swap files
*.swp
*.swo

# Windows shortcuts
*.lnk
